dimension: 32 13/16 x 22 in. (83.34 x 55.88 cm) (without corner tabs/ties)
title: Baby carrier
marks:
Inscription

on back of main panel, in white pig
description: small rectangular flap attached to larger rectangular piece with center gathers; ties cut off; dark blue and black with royal blue and red trim; embroidered squares on flap and main panel are predominately purple and magenta, with star and geometric designs; trim and corner squares on main panel of green, white, black, purple and yellow embroidered scrolls and geometricized designs on red; predominately purple embroidered squares on back of main panel at two corners
creditline: Given in memory of Lynn Swanson
